short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Help the world one tab at a time

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Save our oceans! Everyone generates waste, be it food, plastic, or garbage. Most of that waste ends up in our oceans, polluting our waters, harming sealife, and destroying natural ecosystems. Charitable helps you fix the damage by using the money you generate with every tab to clean our oceans.
